sentences.sentence: A persistent shoplifter has been banned from every shop in town.
sentences.translation: 一个商店行窃惯犯已被禁止进入镇上任何一家商店。

sentences.sentence: I believe he is a shoplifter.
Listen, "said the shoplifter," I know you don't want any trouble either.
sentences.translation: 听着，“小偷说，”我知道你们也不想惹麻烦。
